overview: This concert film was directed by Tijs Torfs and recorded at Trix, Antwerp. Fortress plays five of their songs in a thrilling live concert, accompanied by professional dancers and a violinist.
tagline: This concert film was directed by Tijs Torfs and recorded at Trix, Antwerp. Fortress plays five of their songs in a thrilling live concert, accompanied by professional dancers and a violinist.
title: Fortress, The Concert Film
